attributes.action: undergo a total reformation of Parliament bringing it in line with a more modern approach to democracy and, in light of recent expenses scandals, to become wholly transparent in its approach to ruling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The anger, resentment and bitter feelings towards politicians is evident to the person on the street. After a series of shocking revalations, it is apparentthat the public has lost faith in MP's. A total overhaul of the system is radically needed; it is outdated, serves only those who seek to exploit and is far from transparent. But for some clever investigative journalism, the issues surrounding the expenses claim may have never come to light. How can the people of a nation, engulfed in a recession, ever trust MP's again.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
